The following genes are listed under STAMP V4:

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)

# Read the data
dat = readr::read_tsv(file="/workspaces/starr-oncology-data-lake-arpah/src/stamp_data_dict/oncology_stamp_metadata.tsv")

# Create the subsets
heme_v4= dat %>% 
  filter(pipeline_version == "v4" & assay_performed == "HEME-STAMP")

DT::datatable(heme_v4, options = list(pageLength = 25))
```
